traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the dragon type chosen.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your draconic ancestry determines the size, shape, and damage type of the exhalation.

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

traits.name: Acid Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to acid damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Acid)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals acid damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line.

traits.name: Lightning Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to lightning damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Lightning)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals lightning damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line.

traits.name: Fire Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Fire)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals fire damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line.

traits.name: Lightning Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to lightning damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Lightning)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals lightning damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line.

traits.name: Acid Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to acid damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Acid)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals acid damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line.

traits.name: Fire Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Fire)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals fire damage in a 15 ft. cone.

traits.name: Poison Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to poison damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Poison)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals fire damage in a 15 ft. cone.

traits.name: Fire Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Fire)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals fire damage in a 15 ft. cone.

traits.name: Cold Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to cold damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Cold)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals cold damage in a 15 ft. cone.

traits.name: Cold Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to cold damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Cold)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals cold damage in a 15 ft. cone.

name: Human
languages: One extra language of your choice

traits.name: Versatile
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

traits.name: Extra Feat
traits.description: You gain one extra feat of your choice at 1st level.

traits.name: Bonus Feat
traits.description: You gain one extra feat of your choice at 1st level.

traits.name: Determination
traits.description: Once per short rest, you can reroll an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: 60ft darkvision

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against poison, and resistance against poison damage

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: You have advantage on Intelligence (History) checks related to the origin of stonework.

traits.name: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.name: Dwarven Armor Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

traits.name: Superior Darkvision
traits.description: 120ft darkvision

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: Disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks in sunlight

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against illusions, paralysis, and poison, and resistance against poison damage

traits.name: Duergar Magic
traits.description: At 3rd level, you can cast the Enlarge/Reduce spell on yourself once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast the Invisibility spell on yourself once per long rest.

traits.name: Dwarven Armor Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

traits.name: Mark of Warding Spells
traits.description: You know the Alarm and Mage Armor spells, and can cast them using spell slots once per long rest each.

traits.name: Warder's Intuition
traits.description: When you make an Intelligence (Investigation) check or an ability check using thieves' tools, you can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the ability check.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Although elves reach physical maturity at about the same age as humans, the elven understanding of adulthood goes beyond physical growth to encompass worldly experience. An elf typically claims adulthood and an adult name around the age of 100 and can live to be 750 years old.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: 60ft darkvision

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is 'trance.') While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

traits.name: Extra Language
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Auran

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: You have a flying speed of 30 feet. To use this speed, you can't be wearing medium or heavy armor.

traits.name: Superior Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to the depths of the Underdark, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

traits.name: Drow Magic
traits.description: You know the dancing lights cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the faerie fire spell once with this trait; you regain the ability to cast it when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the darkness spell once per day with this trait; you regain the ability to cast it when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Drow Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows.

traits.name: Elf Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

traits.name: Cantrip
traits.description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.name: Extra Language
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

traits.name: Elf Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

traits.name: Fleet of Foot
traits.description: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.name: Elf Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

traits.name: Fey Step
traits.description: You can cast the misty step spell once using this trait. You regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Cunning Intutition
traits.description: When you make a Charisma (Performance) or Dexterity (Stealth) check, you can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the ability check.

traits.name: Shape Shadows
traits.description: You know the minor illusion cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the invisibility spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Spells of the Mark
traits.description: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Shadow Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

traits.name: Incisive Sense
traits.description: You have advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) and Wisdom (Insight) checks.

traits.name: Blessing of the Moon Weaver
traits.description: You know the light cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the sleep spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the invisibility spell (targeting yourself only) once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Casting these spells with this trait doesn't require material components. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Sea Elf Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the spear, trident, light crossbow, and net.

traits.name: Friend of the Sea
traits.description: Using gestures and sounds, you can communicate simple ideas with any beast that has an innate swimming speed.

traits.name: Extra Language
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Aquan.

traits.name: Necrotic Resistance.
traits.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

traits.name: Blessing of the Raven Queen
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.  Starting at 3rd level, you also gain resistance to all damage when you teleport using this trait. The resistance lasts until the start of your next turn. During that time, you appear ghostly and translucent.
